import { useState } from 'react' function Cart({ cart, updateCart }) { const nokiaLumia = 450 //const [cart, updateCart] = useState(0) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(true) const total = cart.reduce( (acc, productType) => acc + productType.amount * productType.price, 0 ) return (
isOpen ? (
Panier
    {cart.map(({ name, price, amount }, index) => (
    {name} {price}€ x {amount}
    ))}

Total : {total}€

) : (
)
) } export default Cart
